sectionSubtitle: Notes on regulations, white papers, and technical deep dives.

items.title: AI Legal Research System Design
items.blurb: System blueprint for applying AI to legal research workflows with traceability and review controls.
items.description: Design framework for retrieval, citation grounding, and human-in-the-loop legal analysis.

items.title: AI Water Operations Research & Pilots
items.blurb: Pilot concepts for introducing AI into utility operations with measurable operational outcomes.
items.description: Covers use cases, rollout sequencing, and performance metrics for water sector pilots.

items.title: AI for Regulatory Process Analysis
items.blurb: Methods for using AI to map, compare, and interpret complex regulatory processes.
items.description: Focuses on workflow bottlenecks, policy interpretation consistency, and implementation support.

items.title: Baywork Briefing Doc
items.blurb: Briefing summary connecting regional context, operational constraints, and action priorities.
items.description: Compact briefing artifact for stakeholder alignment and project framing.

items.title: CFEE Talk
items.blurb: Talk material outlining practical pathways for modernized infrastructure operations.
items.description: Presentation notes tailored for technical audiences and policy-adjacent stakeholders.

items.title: Can Public Agencies Capture Price-Signal Feedback?
items.blurb: Analysis of whether public systems can absorb and act on market-like operational signals.
items.description: Explores governance, incentives, and feedback loop design in agency environments.

items.title: Civic Ledger: GovTech Landscape Analysis
items.blurb: Landscape scan of GovTech patterns, capabilities, and implementation opportunities.
items.description: Compares tooling approaches and strategic positioning across public-sector technology.

items.title: Cyclical Administrative Reform Patterns in Western Democracies
items.blurb: Pattern map of reform cycles, institutional drift, and recurring implementation challenges.
items.description: Historical framing of why reform waves repeat and how execution quality varies.

items.title: Deep Dive: New Bureaucracy Water Study
items.blurb: Deep technical and institutional analysis of emergent public utility operating models.
items.description: Connects service delivery constraints to modern organizational design choices.

items.title: East Bay Geology Research Report
items.blurb: Regional geology summary focused on implications for water systems and infrastructure.
items.description: Links subsurface context to siting, resilience, and operational planning.

items.title: FieldOps Assistant
items.blurb: Concept for field-facing operational support with actionable, context-aware guidance.
items.description: Frames assistant behavior for dispatch, troubleshooting, and decision support.

items.title: Modernizing Surface Water Treatment
items.blurb: Practical modernization pathways for process reliability, compliance, and performance.
items.description: Outlines upgrades spanning controls, process strategy, and operating discipline.

items.title: Non-Federal Collaboration: Water & Utilities
items.blurb: Collaboration models outside federal structures for faster utility problem-solving.
items.description: Examines state, regional, and cross-sector partnerships for delivery outcomes.

items.title: State PFAS Regulation vs. Federal Withdrawal
items.blurb: Comparative analysis of state action pathways under shifting federal posture.
items.description: Highlights compliance risk, enforcement variance, and planning implications.

items.title: Steelman Arguments for EPA Budget Cuts and Regulation
items.blurb: Structured argument map of fiscal and regulatory reduction claims.
items.description: Presents strongest-case reasoning to stress-test policy and operations assumptions.

items.title: Strategic Water Infrastructure Solutions: Case Studies
items.blurb: Case-based review of infrastructure interventions and measurable utility outcomes.
items.description: Distills transferable lessons from implementation examples.

items.title: The New Bureaucracy: Comprehensive Doctrine for State Capacity
items.blurb: Doctrine-oriented framework for rebuilding administrative capacity and execution.
items.description: Integrates governance design with operational delivery expectations.

items.title: Transit Excellence Pilot Program (TEPP): Strategic Framework
items.blurb: Pilot strategy for service excellence, operational metrics, and phased delivery.
items.description: Defines pilot scope, governance, and measurement architecture.

items.title: Water Sector Solutions Research
items.blurb: Compiled sector research on practical interventions across utility constraints.
items.description: Broad synthesis spanning technical, organizational, and policy levers.

items.title: Water Utility Strategic Readiness Assessment
items.blurb: Readiness framework for evaluating utility capacity before major initiatives.
items.description: Assessment model for staffing, systems maturity, risk posture, and execution readiness.

_guide: Each item should include: id, title, blurb, description, tag, status, featured, url. Thumbnail is optional.
